=== What is it? ===

A event to act as a stepping stone for people in general and/or from the Florida LoCo to get further involved in Ubuntu development in general and/or for future releases.

This page will provide info about Packaging Jams in general and a reoccurring event date.

=== When is it? ===

The first event was August 8th, 2009. The next event will be announced shortly, stay tuned!

=== Where is it? ===
When we announce the next Packaging Jam, we'll announce the location here!

See <nowiki>[[FloridaTeam-Projects-Venues]]</nowiki>.
